title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Your outlook determines your success. Tedious chores and errands require your undivided focus today, not your avoidance. You might wish you could ignore the Aries Full Moons spotlight in your 3rd House of Immediate Environment in order to dwell on the fascinating distant horizon. But the cosmos is reminding you of the wisdom of being content right where you are now, and the benefit of tackling the work in front of you. Although repetitive tasks may be dull, your positive attitude need not diminish. Author Arnold Bennett wrote, The gain in self-confidence of having accomplished a tiresome labor is immense. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
